summary: LTR FM JAMES HENDERSON (NY) RE THE DEFECTIVE 1997 MERCURY TRACER...*MR  THE CONSUMER AND HIS WIFE OWNED TWO FORD VEHICLES AND BOTH EXPERIENCED BROKEN REAR SPRINGS.  FORD REFUSED TO CONSIDER COMPENSATION FOR THE MANUFACTURING DEFECT.  THE RIGHT OUTER TIE RODS WERE INSTALLED AND THE REAR SPRINGS WERE REPLACED.  OTHER CONSUMERS WITH THE SAME MAKE AND MODEL  EXPERIENCED THE SAME PROBLEM.  (1997 MERCURY TRACER AND 1999 FORD ESCORT)  SCC   *JB
